description:
-Retrieves future/past opponents
-Retrieves game scores (including lives ones)
-Retrieves names of top scorers
exampleInteractions: Alexa ask Hockey Reference for the score for the Stars yesterday
Alexa ask Hockey Reference who the Kings play this week
Alexa ask Hockey Reference who the top 5 goal scorers last week are
imageAltText: Hockey Schedule and Score Checker icon
name: Hockey Schedule and Score Checker
shortDescription: Get score updates, future opponents, and stat leaders for every NHL team.
